txt.en:
'Tanim is my name. I'll not attempt to deceive you with some sad story about an ailing child, sibling, mother, or other nonsense. I'll tell you straight what and why I want what I want.

'In Umbar Baharbêl, there is a newfound freedom. That freedom comes with opportunity, and I am seizing mine. You see, people will pay for any foolish notion or thought. Want to look younger, be strong, or faster? Enterprising scholars will brew you a potion or two to fit your needs. Those scholars need a product, and you can get me the product I need.

'Jungle-beast horns. Tales tell of their mystical qualities, and I aim to make my coin while I can. Would you help an honest man?'
You slew several beasts in the Shield Isles and collected their horns. Tanim awaits your return at his home in Halrax.
Tanim directed you to hunt jungle-beasts throughout the Shield Isles for their horns. They fetch a good price in Umbar City.
Deliver the jungle-beast horns to Tanim at Halrax
'You'll find the beasts I seek all over the Shield Isles. After collecting twelve sets of their horns, return them to me.'
'Yes, this is a fine selection of horns. A little polish and a spit-shine, and they'll be ready to ship into the city. You've helped me, friend. Let me line your pockets as you've lined mine.'
Head into the wild lands of the Shield Isles and search for Ghar Jâdam, Sekbiri, or Bâkhabar jungle-beasts. Collect their horns ands return to Tanim at Halrax.
